thread.title: Mr Stewart Butler
thread.title_full: Motorama reviewed by Mr Stewart Butler

author: Mr Stewart Butler
title: Mr Stewart Butler
text:
A couple of years ago, I had the absolute pleasure of being invited to the HSV Drive Experience at Mount Cotton by Dave Williams, Dealer Principle.
To say it was an incredible experience would be an understatement.
I got to drive the VF GTS before it was even released as well as all of the HSV range.
I had always aspired to own A HSV, and from the moment I contacted Dave, he made the decision and whole process a pleasure.
Gerrard was very knowledgeable and helpful and even after changing my mind numerous times on color, they delivered my pride and joy exactly the way I wanted it.
The service was outstanding throughout all aspects of my purchase and each time I was made to feel like the most important customer they had.
I would highly recommend the team at Motorama HSV to anyone considering the purchase of one of these last few iconic vehicles.
Thankyou Dave and Gerrard for making my dreams come true.
